lines.content: “the bleeding populace ripped apart by the tyrannical
fascist hitlerific naziist totalarianist satanist
tyrannical establishment who are bleeding
puppets under the cruel evil malevolent fascist
tyrannical establishment puppet
master who leads them to the their doom in
the chasm of justice,where dirty
faced children(not clean-faced)cry with the
tears of labor which envelop us all(even me
in my hotel)as the devil in white laughs
as he sends more innocent heroic god-like
soldiers to their deaths forced by their
desire for education to gun
down helpless people these soldiers possessed by the
beast in the white house and the murdererous
ceos who feast on all of our sweat
and blood as they hold the controls of society under
their hooves
“What are YOU going to do about it?
Because, personally, I have other things to do.”
